TopicTitle: Help me find out why im crashing pls!

Articles.Content:
Cant figure it out. Here is my Log.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T15:44:33Z" title="06/24/2015 03:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by AStelloh**

My first and only guess is its a permissions issue, KSP has those with some folders, try reinstalling to c:\KSP or such, if that fails to work please check out our post for waht other information may be needed. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)
